text: Franco Lepore (born 16 August 1985) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Italian club Monza. ==Honours== === Club === Lecce * Serie B: 2009–10 Monza * Serie C Group A: 2019–20 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Serie B players Category:A.S.G.
